text: Dorothy Morris (February 23, 1922 â€“ November 20, 2011) was an American actress. She played roles of "the girl next door". She played Sue in Cry Havoc. She played Edith Bryant in This Time for Keeps. Morris was born in Los Angeles, California. She died at age eighty-nine in Palm Springs, California Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Hollywood Category:1922 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Dorothy Morris
